title: Handle a Passenger Complaint
description: A passenger submits a complaint about a bus driver's unprofessional behavior. A customer service manager must investigate.

tasks.description: Receive the complaint, noting the route, vehicle number, date, and time.
Identify the driver who was operating that specific bus at that time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system correctly identifies the driver on duty.

tasks.description: Review the on-board video footage from the bus for the time of the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager reviews the video to see the interaction.

tasks.description: Based on the findings, schedule a meeting with the driver to discuss the incident and any necessary disciplinary action.
tasks.expected_outcome: The complaint is investigated, and appropriate follow-up action is taken.
